thread.title: BRIEF-Rosehill Resources Says In Late Dec. Company's Net Daily Production Exceeded 10,000 Net BOE

title: BRIEF-Rosehill Resources Says In Late Dec. Company's Net Daily Production Exceeded 10,000 Net BOE
text: March 12, 2018 / 11:20 AM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Rosehill Resources Says In Late Dec. Company's Net Daily Production Exceeded 10,000 Net BOE Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Rosehill Resources Inc: * ROSEHILL RESOURCES PROVIDES OPERATIONAL UPDATE * ROSEHILL RESOURCES INC SAYS IN LATE DECEMBER, COMPANYâ€™S NET DAILY PRODUCTION EXCEEDED 10,000 NET BOE * ROSEHILL RESOURCES - DUE TO SEVERE COLD WEATHER, SIMULTANEOUS OPERATIONS DOWNTIME FROM ROSEHILL, OTHERS, JAN PRODUCTION WAS LIMITED TO UNDER 9,000 NET BOEPD * ROSEHILL RESOURCES - FIRST WEEK OF MARCH HAS SEEN CONTINUED RAMP UP OF PRODUCTION, WITH TOTAL PRODUCTION AVERAGING ABOUT 13,000 NET BOEPD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
